promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic lynx steel-type pokemon wearing a grey crystal headband. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystacougar, a a massive basic lynx steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Metal Jail. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "steel" or "Crystacougar". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lynx-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: This majestic beast, with veins of pure metal coursing through its figure, prowls icy peaks. It can ensnare foes in hardened alloy.
